short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Sanctuary, the meditation app that brings peace and clarity to your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our box pattern breathing exercise animation guides you through a customizable interval practice, helping you relax and recenter. Set your own pace and use Sanctuary whenever you need to take a moment for yourself. Our simple and visually appealing interface makes it easy to incorporate mindfulness into your daily routine. Whether you have a few spare minutes or an hour to spare, Sanctuary is the perfect tool for finding inner peace and balance. Try it out today and discover the benefits of regular meditation.
